Name: Insomnia
About the game: ABOUT THE EXPERIENCE: Insomnia : 'prolonged and usually abnormal inability to get enough sleep especially due to trouble falling asleep or staying asleep' - Some Dictionary The game is simple... Try to sleep. We can't promise that the night will be uneventful, however. Between apparitions of ancient interdimensional entities to a city that never sleeps, overcoming your insomnia may prove to be difficult. EARLY ACCESS FEATURES: A cozy bed to sleep in, An elegant but unreliable pocket watch subject to the wills of the supernatural, Retro alarm clock to keep track of the countless hours you haven't slept, Immersive sound design made by a schizophrenic insomniac, Your own personal sleep paralysis demon! RELEASE ROADMAP: More dreamscapes to explore and interact with, Additional spontaneous events to experience in the waking world, New decisions to make and additional endings to discover, Comprehensive conclusion to the story and the hints that correlate,
Meta Title: Insomnia: Nov 10, 2022, Firebug Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Insomnia? Check out the release date (Nov 10, 2022), developer insights from Firebug Games, and a complete game summary.
